item.name: 親指シフト+Q to Smart[英数/かな]キー
Command_L+arrow_UP to PageUp

item.name: Command_L+arrow_DOWN to PageDown

item.appendix: SSandS (Shift_R+L to Shift+Han_Space, Shift_L+Shift_R to Zen_Space)+ [KeyRepeat]

item.name: Command+Control+SPACE to Option+F/T(かわせみ: 和英/確定履歴 変換)
